revision.text: {{Wired embedded system |brand=Nuvoton |model=NK-980ETH2P |revision=V1.2 |is_manuf=Yes |price=89 |est_release_date=10/2019 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel plug |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Nuvoton |cpu1_model=NUC980;NUC980DK61YC; |cpu1_cspeed=300 |cpu2_brand=Nuvoton |cpu2_model=NUC123;NUC123ZD4; |cpu2_cspeed=72 |fla1=128 |fla1_brand=Winbond |fla1_model=W25N01GVZE1G |fla2=68 KiB |fla2_brand=Nuvoton |fla2_model=NUC123 |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Nuvoton |ram1_model=NUC980 |ram2=20 KiB |ram2_brand=Nuvoton |ram2_model=NUC123 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes,, 10-pin header,, unpopulated,, CON3 |serial=yes,, USB Female Micro-B,, (115200 8N1), |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101GR |eth_chip3_brand=IC+ |eth_chip3_model=IP101GR |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=2 |addl_chips=3,3V to 5.5V Two-channel RS-232 Line Driver/Receiver;TI;SN75C3232E;;2;,,, 3.3V RS-485 Transceiver;TI;SN65HDV11;;2;,,, High Efficiency Step Down DC/DC Converter;ZillTek;ZT7103;;3;,,, Charger Protection IC;Anpec;APL3211A;;1;,,, |flags=Micro SD Card slot, RS485, RS232, UART, I2C, SPI, ADC, CAN, GPIO, |stock_boot=U-Boot;2016.11;; |stock_os=Linux;4.4.115;Buildroot |default_ip=192.168.0.100 |oui_eth=08:00:27, }} {{TagLine|NuMaker-Server-NUC980}} :{{ProductPage|https://www.nuvoton.com/products/iot-solution/iot-platform/numaker-server-nuc980/}} {{See also|List of Single-board computers}} ===Specifications=== *CPU: [[Nuvoton]] [https://www.nuvoton.com/products/microprocessors/arm9-mpus/nuc980-industrial-control-iot-series/nuc980dk61yc/ NU980] ARM926EJ-S @300MHz *Storage: 128MB SPI NAND flash + Micro SD (TF) slot *RAM: Built-in 64MB DDR2 *USB: 1x USB 2.0 Type A, 1x USB 2.0 Micro-B *Network: 2x Fast Ethernet *Power Source: 5V/2A barrel plug or USB Female Micro-B ==Images== ---- __NOTOC__
